briefTitle: An RCT to Evaluate the Effect of a New Skin Care Regimen on SBF in Those With Podoconiosis
officialTitle: A Randomised Controlled Trial to Evaluate the Effect of a New Skin Care Regimen on Skin Barrier Function in Those With Podoconiosis in Ethiopia

interventions.name: Current skin care regimen plus 2% glycerine added to soaking water

summary: An RCT (n=193) in two podoconiosis clinics in Ethiopia to evaluate the effectiveness of a research based skin management regimen compared to the current regimen. The experimental group added 2% glycerine to the current skin care regimen and used 1 litre of water in the water soak compared to the 6 litres used in the current regimen.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in TEWL at Top of Outer Lower Legs
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Change from baseline following 3 months of intervention
